meanings.definition: A knitted garment worn on the upper body to keep warm.
meanings.sent1: I wore my cozy sweater on a chilly day.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new sweater for the winter season.
meanings.sent3: The sweater kept me snug like a hug from a friend.
meanings.sent4: Her sweater was a shield against the cold wind.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sweater brightened up her outfit.

meanings.definition: To cover or provide with a sweater.
meanings.sent1: I will sweater you up before we go outside.
meanings.sent2: She decided to sweater herself to stay warm.
meanings.sent3: He tried to sweater the dog, but it wriggled away.
meanings.sent4: The trees were sweatered in snow after the storm.
meanings.sent5: The mother sweatered her child in love and care.
